image.name: body-bg-image
image.description: Optional background image for the body of your website.

dropdown.name: body-bg-image-repeat
dropdown.description: Your option to repeat the uploaded image infinitely, repeat it on the y/x axis, or no repeat at all.

dropdown.name: body-bg-image-size
dropdown.description: Cover scales the image to be as large as possible. Contain scales the image to either the width or the height depending on which is longer. Percentages will scale the image to a percentage of the browser

text.name: default-border-radius
text.description: The default curvature for borders around elements.

color.name: content-bg-color
color.description: The background color of all content boxes.

color.name: sidebar-bg-color
color.description: The font for all h1-h3 tags on the site

color.name: sidebar-font-color
color.description: The color for links throughout the site

dropdown.name: body-bg-image-attachment
dropdown.description: Fixed will leave the background image where it is as you scroll. Scroll will scroll the background image as you scroll.

text.name: default-spacing
text.description: This occurs in forms, and other areas where space is needed. It's meant to keep the site consistently spaced, there are areas that use this number in division to keep a digital feng shui

color.name: accent-color
color.description: This color is used for hairlines, borders, even color on tables, and general aesthetics

option.description: A number. This is default for ordered lists
A number with leading zeros (01, 02, 03, etc.)
A filled circle. This is default for unordered lists
Lowercase Alphabet (a, b, c, d, e, etc.)
Lowercase Latin Letters (a, b, c, d, e, etc.)
Lowercase Roman Numerals (i, ii, iii, iv, v, etc.)
Uppercase Alphabet (A, B, C, D, E, etc.)
Uppercase Latin Letters (A, B, C, D, E, etc.)
Uppercase Roman Numerals (I, II, III, IV, V, etc.)
The value of this property is inherited from the parent element

text.name: mobile-edge-padding
text.description: This prevents text from bleeding straight to the edge when user is on a mobile device.

color.name: nav-at-font-color
color.description: The color of the Navigation element when you are at the page

dropdown.name: responsive-break-down
dropdown.description: This tells the grid to split columns down immediately to 1 column, or attempt to line them up
